title: Loving dumbasses.
body:
So basically this happened.

http://image.prntscr.com/image/b93203241c954a81ad5c0aaf008456af.png

Basically a normal loss, where basically we started not doing damage, and they started getting fed after being fairly stomped early, and i told Annie fairly early she will need a void staff, and she said that she would build a rabadon's instead, and then complained about doing no damage, while building a fucking rabadon's.

For anyone that doesn't understand **Rabadon's won't magically make you start dealing damage**

Then i get this gem in post game.

http://image.prntscr.com/image/0b872755776040709d051a9a0662ac58.png

Silver annie telling me i'm bad in a S- Kha game, because i pointed out she should have built Void staff in post game (and during the game), oh and she reported me as well, which is always fun.

Legit, what is the logic behind rabadons making you magically do damage?

replies.body:
LMAO. This is classic JasonWazza. He flames every single "bronzie" that makes a post similar to this. He even makes separate threads complaining about the amount of "bronzies" that make these posts. On one occasion he begged for a ban on the forums so he didn't have to deal with these posts...

For someone in bronze and silver it can never be the case that someone "stupid" on their team is the main reason they lost. I mean this guy in the past has even told people that someone afk the entire game on their team wasn't the main reason they lost. It's always "your fault" and you lost because "you're bad". Somehow the same doesn't apply in his case. Oh that's right hes gold 5 and thinks that's good LOL.

I mean shit, this guy deserves a ban. He'll throw the "strawman" argument out there but he has basically admitted that he harasses people post game as riot doesn't care and therefore he can get away with it like he does on these forums. Obviously he's not taking screenshots on those occasions.

>but he has basically admitted that he harasses people post game

Please again find where i said that, i make proper conversations post game, so that i'm not wasting people's time in game for fucking typing, if they get aggressive, or use swears, i will open up my language.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=JjrbEP9d,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2016-07-09T00:35:46.045+0000)
>
> Not that it matters, because as normal, if i'm going to say something to someone it's in post game, because it holds 2 effects.
> 
> 1. riot doesn't care
> 2. the person doesn't spend the entire time typing instead of doing useful things.
> 
> Fact is she was being stupid and was a big reason we lost, she couldn't even one shot the squishy's because the squishy's had MR, and there is mountains of proof that riot doesn't care what is said pre and post game.

>Fucking strawman, that is not at all what i said.

>I said i'm not going to start a conversation during game, because of 2, the fact that i had to say she was being fucking stupid is an entirely different matter (and to be clear, she had used the same words in game from memory.)

>But by all means, make any excuse you want.

> **Real talk here, why even bother?**
> 
> + The game had ended at this point, _so why continue to lecture her on her build? _
> 
>  She wasn't listening in-game according to you. _What makes you think the post-game would be any better? _
 
>  I'm not sure whether you're trying to help **Annie**, or if you're trying to shift blame for the loss, but you didn't really do either of those and just made the match more salty for everyone.
 
It looks like she listened anyway and sold the **Rabbadon's** for a **Abyssal Scepter** to get magic penetration like you advised. There was literally no good reason to bring the **Void Staff** incident up again after the game ended.

_Think about how you interact with others in League, in the long run it ends up effecting us all._
Just my advice on the matter.

>It looks like she listened anyway and sold the Rabbadon's for a Abyssal Scepter to get magic penetration like you advised.

No that was like her, i want to say third item.

And the point isn't that she wasn't listening in game, i brought it up again, because i thought she might actually listen if i could put in a bit more effort to explain, they had a shit ton of MR, she needed % penetration instead of flat.

>Think about how you interact with others in League, in the long run it ends up effecting us all.

Yes because me trying to make a suggestion at all is a terrible thing.

It's not your suggestion that is terrible, it's the way you actually go about suggesting.

To remove a weed you must be harsh, but to raise a garden you must be gentle.

**An example of a suggestion:**

> **JasonWazza:** If you're not dealing any damage I think you should build void staff they have a lot of magic res atm
> 
> **Annie:** Nah, my Rabbadon's should be working
> 
> **JasonWazza:** Alright lol, maybe build void as a last item then?
 
**An example of shaming and forcing someone:**

> **JasonWazza:** If you're not dealing any damage I think you should build void staff they have a lot of magic res atm
> 
> **Annie:** Nah, my Rabbadon's should be working
> 
> **JasonWazza:** That's fucking stupid look at their mr
> 
> **JasonWazza:** You're the main part of the reason for the loss

I'm not even asking you to stop suggesting builds in-game, but don't be a douche about it. You're not helping anyone and you'll end up getting yourself banned at some point. 

If they don't listen then forget about it. Arguments and conflict will make you loose the game far more often than a few strange items in a build.

You're a great member of the community man, but what you're doing here is unnecessary and kinda toxic TBH...

Not that it matters, because as normal, if i'm going to say something to someone it's in post game, because it holds 2 effects.

1. riot doesn't care
2. the person doesn't spend the entire time typing instead of doing useful things.

Fact is she was being stupid and was a big reason we lost, she couldn't even one shot the squishy's because the squishy's had MR, and there is mountains of proof that riot doesn't care what is said pre and post game.

Are you telling me you're using the post-game chat to harass players because you think it's less likely you'll be banned?

This is falling low man... :(

And to be clear it does "matter", **Annie** is a real person and when you choose to harass her for her mistakes it will matter to her.

>Are you telling me you're using the post-game chat to harass players because you think it's less likely you'll be banned?

Fucking strawman, that is not at all what i said.

I said i'm not going to start a conversation during game, because of 2, the fact that i had to say she was being fucking stupid is an entirely different matter (and to be clear, she had used the same words in game from memory.)

But by all means, make any excuse you want.

I'm only pulling you up here because I think it's really out of character man. You always hated toxicity in the community and wanted **Riot** to do more for us. That's really cool.

But I honestly this is way out of line, and you've kinda become part of the problem a bit here. I hope maybe in the future you'll see this incident in a different light and reflect on it.

I find you sticking up for riot hilarious, when you couldn't say anything on my post about riot not trying to actually curb toxicity.

That said, i said that building rabadon's instead of void staff into a heavy MR team was stupid, this is apparently toxic now according to you.
